pullRequest.title: [ML] Remove unnecessary version constraints
pullRequest.bodyText:
Remove checks on version numbers from the serialisation code that are no longer necessary in the 8.0.0 branch.
Labelling as non-issue as this should have no functional effect.

commit.message:
[ML] Remove unnecessary version constraints

Remove checks on version numbers from the serialisation code that are no longer necessary in the 8.0.0 branch

nodes.bodyText: For this file it is probably worth leaving the BWC code in master for a bit longer.  It's very complex and would be a nasty shock for someone seeing it for the first time on a backport to 7.x.

As above, this is very complex and it would be useful for anyone changing it on the master branch to be aware the complexity exists in 7.x.  So it's probably best to leave this file untouched until closer to 8.0 feature freeze too.
This needs to stay.  The 7.5 here is embedded in the config document, not the node version.  Unless we do something else 8.x will still have to cope with configs created in 7.5 and before.
As with outlier detection, the version here is in the config, not the current node version, so this should stay.
As with outlier detection, the version here is in the config, not the current node version, so this should stay.

commit.message:
[ML] Attending to code review comments

Reverting the more complex changes as these are best dealt with after
8.0.0 feature freeze.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:elasticsearch/elasticsearch into remove_version_constraints

nodes.bodyText: nit: a space has accidentally been removed from this line

commit.message:

Merge branch 'master' of github.com:elasticsearch/elasticsearch into remove_version_constraints
